name: Development of Rural Economy and Manpower India
briefDescription: DREAM-India, Balangir is registered under Society Act No. XXI of 1860 in the year 1995-96, IT-12 (A), and IT-80 (G) (applied)  is always talking pro-poor, Dalit and indigenous rights to ensure life and livelihood in Balangir-I Block of Balangir District. The untiring efforts of the committed youths, dedicated volunteer and professional staff are main strength that facilitates to communitize the development process in reference areas.  We have successfully conducted School health Camp, Awareness on POLIO eradication, maternal health and AIDS awareness. At present we are providing Diploma in Computer Application - DCA course through computer literacy program in collaboration with Orissa Computer Literacy Mission, Child Care mid-day-meals in 6
